detailsOfAchievement: Watershed Management Tremendous work done in Water and Soil Conservation Afforestation twenty lacs trees planted under bund farming activity four lac trees plantation on wasteland Health Hygiene Sanitation Livestock Development More than one three six Vet Camps organized Basic Education Facilities Distribution of School kits in rural school students benefited Skill Development Short term courses on Carpentry Fabrication and Electrician etc imparted Focus on creating opportunities

sourceOfFunds.purpose: UPS FOUNDATION : A logistic MNC has been involved with Vanarai since last couple of years. Last year plantation activity was carried out in educational campus. The total plantation was around 600 nos. The survival percentage was about 90 percent due to proper care taken by teaching staff and students. Hardy varieties plants like Neem karanj wad chinch etc were planted Six posters relating to environment were given to Eco Club Membership school one set of book on environment were distributed CDs

HSBC : A soft ware Company Vanarai is associated with the said company for a very long time. We have provided RO for drinking water purpose it was the latest and most advanced plant for treating water The source of water was Bore Well Waater quality TDS V 50 ppm Feed flow rate thousand LPH Permeate Flow Rate five hundred LPH The reverse osmosis process uses semi permeable spiral wound membrane to seperate and remove dissolve solids organic pyrogen submicron colloidal matter and bacteria from i t

Elantas Beck India Ltd had financed the scheme Health Hygiene and Sanitation we have constructed Individual Toilets for 50 units because of acute shortage of water We use 2 pits for the same Earlier defacation in open areas were practised after construction of toilets major problems of the ladies were sorted out Villagers have been imbibed to use toilets Women and teen age girls have been benefited tremendously We provided E Learning Kits three nos to Zilla Parishad schools Children are benefit

this was with help of Elantas Beck again under the scheme Health Hygiene and Sanitation 50 individual are being constructed. th is is to eliminate total defection Again 3 E learning Kits were provided to three Zilla Parisad schools to bring the deprived students to the desired level We have also provided Water Purifiers of 250 litres capacity enabling the teaching staff and the students to drink infected free water Thereby eliminating medical problem We are also constructing Toilets and Urinal

detailsOfAchievement: Varadaan was establish in Nagpur in It is a register society which is license under Orphanages and Other Charitable homes Supervision and Control Act and Juvenile Justice Care and Protection Amended Act and has certificate to do in country adoption from Commissioner ate Women and Child Development Pune Maharashtra the broad aim of Varadaan is child welfare Projects Promotion of Indian adoption Bal Sangopan Yojana Eklavya Shikshan Yojana CHILDLINE emergency helpline service for children in Nagpur city on NovemberVaradaan as a Support Organization is a partner of this ambitious network project which is initiated by the CHILDLINE India Foundation for the care and protection of children difficult circumstances in different cities in the country Since Varadaan is working as a Collaborative organization Creche in the Toli community School House for Children in Difficult Circumstances Project within slums in the city of Nagpur established by Varadaan in the year the broad aim behind this initiative was to assure protection of rights of children and to provide a safe place for children outside their homes within the community The Ministry of Women and Child Development and Ministry of Railways Government of India jointly taken an initiative to ensure the care and protection security and well being of runaway unaccompanied and trafficked children who come in contact with the railways Services are being provided to children who directly come into contact with the Railways based on calls and cases reported to CHILDLINE
